Priest Bandellos:
Welcome, brother of the forest. May the blessing of starlight rest upon you.
This temple is where the Humans serve Einhasad. We Elves, who worship under the trees of the forest and the starry skies, have difficulty understanding how they can commune with the gods from within a building of stone and brick, but each race has its own customs. Odd as they may seem.
While here, we should follow the ways of the Human world, don't you think? Let us begin.
